Trigger.TriggerText:
declare

 valor_cont number ;
 monto_cont number ;
begin 
Go_block ('CONT_CXP');
Clear_Block(No_validate);
Execute_Query (All_records);
Validate (Record_Scope); 
:global.monto :=0; 
 begin
 select monto 
 into valor_cont 
 from cont_cxp 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 n_cont = :control.n_cont and
 n_ide = :control.n_ide;
 exception
 when no_data_found then 
 messagebox('El contrato no tiene Monto definalo');
 when too_many_rows then 
 null;
 end; 
 
 go_item('cont_cxp.tip_min'); 
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 HayCont Varchar2(1);
Begin
 Begin
 Select Distinct 'S' Into HayCont
 From Cont_Cxp
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa And
 N_Cont = :Cont_Cxp.N_Cont;
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 HayCont := 'N';
 End;
 If HayCont = 'S' Then
 MessageBox ('Nro. de Contrato ya está Registrado');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If;
End;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 Select A.tipo, B.nom 
 Into :Cont_Cxp.tipo_cxp, :Cont_Cxp.Nom_cxp 
 From Cxp_enc a, tipo_cxp b 
 Where A.c_emp = :Global.Empresa 
 And A.c_agr = :Cont_Cxp.C_agr 
 And A.N_cxp = :Cont_Cxp.N_Cxp
 And A.n_ide = :Cont_Cxp.N_ide 
 And A.tipo = B.C_tip 
 And A.c_emp = B.c_emp;
Exception 
 When No_Data_Found Then 
 Null;
End;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 Select des 
 Into :Cont_Cxp.Nom_tip_min
 From TIPO_CONTRATO 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa And
 Tipo = :Cont_Cxp.Tip_Min And
 Nom = :Cont_Cxp.Nom_Min;
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 :Cont_Cxp.Nom_tip_min:='No Se Encuentra Registrado';
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then 
 Messagebox('verifique Tipo de Minuta Duplicado');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 End;

Item.Name: OC
Item.Label: F Ini
Item.Hint: Por Favor Digite el número de la orden de compra

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 Orden oc_enc.oc%type;
Begin
 If :cont_cxp.oc is null then
 :cont_cxp.ano_oc := Null;
 Else
 Begin
 select oc into orden
 from oc_enc
 where ano = to_char(:cont_cxp.f_ini,'YYYY') and
 c_emp = :global.empresa and
 c_agr = :cont_cxp.c_agr and
 proved = :cont_cxp.n_ide and
 oc = :cont_cxp.oc;
 Exception
 When no_Data_found then
 messagebox('No existe la Orden de compra '||:cont_cxp.oc||' En el año '||to_char(:cont_cxp.f_ini,'YYYY'));
 Raise Form_trigger_Failure;
 end;
 End If;
End;

Item.Name: ANO_OC
Item.Label: F Ini
Item.Hint: Por Favir Digite el ano de la orden de compra

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin

 If To_char(:cont_cxp.f_ini,'YYYY')< :Cont_cxp.ano_oc then
 messagebox('La fecha de Inicio de Contrato no debe ser menor Que el ano de la Orden de compra');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If;
 :cont_cxp.tas:=tasacambio(:Global.Empresa,:cont_cxp.mon,:cont_cxp.f_ini);
 End;

Item.Name: MONTO
Item.Label: Monto
Item.Hint: Por Favor Ingrese El Monto Del Contrato.

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 SaldoCont Cont_Cxp.Saldo%Type;
 maximo_smlv proy_cxp.maximo_smlv%type;
 minimo_smlv proy_cxp.minimo_smlv%type;
 montoproc proc_sel.monto%type := 0;
 Res Number;
 resp number;
 cuenta Number;
Begin
 
 
If :cont_cxp.monto is not null and :cont_cxp.Oc is not null Then
 begin
 Select nvl(totbruto,0) + nvl(iva,0)
 Into montoproc
 From Oc_Enc
 Where C_emp = :Global.Empresa
 and c_agr = :Cont_Cxp.C_AGR
 and ano = :Cont_Cxp.ano_Oc
 And Oc = :Cont_Cxp.Oc;
 Exception When No_Data_Found Then
 MessageBox('No encontrado el monto de la OC');
 montoproc := 0;
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 end;
 If :cont_cxp.monto > montoproc then
 MessageBox('Monto del Contrato no Puede ser superior al Monto de la OC.');
 resp := preguntar('Desea Dejar el nuevo valor? (S/N)');
 If resp = 0 then
 MessageBox('Valide Monto del Contrato ');
 go_item('CONT_CXP.MONTO');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If;
 End If;

End If; 
-- Se incluye validación del cambio del monto. Sólo se podrá cambiar el monto cuando el contrato
-- no haya tenido movimientos.
If :global.monto != :cont_cxp.monto then
 cuenta := 0;
 Begin
 Select count(*)
 Into cuenta
 From Ord_pag_det
 Where C_emp = :Global.empresa
 And c_agr = :cont_cxp.c_agr
 And N_cont = :cont_cxp.n_cont;
 Exception When No_Data_Found Then
 cuenta := 0;
 End;
 If cuenta > 0 Then
 Messagebox('Monto del Contrato no puede ser variado. Ya posee pagos.');
 go_item('CONT_CXP.MONTO');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 Else
 :cont_cxp.saldo := :cont_cxp.monto;
 End If;
else
 :cont_cxp.saldo := :cont_cxp.monto;
End If;
If (VerificaMod ('PRESOF')) And :cont_cxp.monto>0 And :cont_cxp.otrosi='S' Then
 --
 -- Determina en que rango de salarios mínimos
 -- se encuetra el contrato
 --
 Begin
 Select maximo_smlv, minimo_smlv
 Into maximo_smlv, minimo_smlv
 From proy_cxp
 Where c_emp=:global.empresa and
 c_proy=:cont_cxp.prog_proy and
 (
 (:cont_cxp.monto between
 minimo_smlv and maximo_smlv)
 or
 (minimo_smlv is null or maximo_smlv is null)
 );
 Exception
 When no_data_found then
 Messagebox ('El monto del contrato no se encuentra dentro del '||
 'intervalo de los salarios minimos asignados ');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 When Too_many_rows Then
 Messagebox('Los montos de salarios minimos estan duplicados. ');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 End;
 If maximo_smlV is null or minimo_smlv is null then
 Messagebox ('El monto del contrato no se encuentra dentro del '||
 'intervalo de los salarios minimos asignados ');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 End If; 
 If :cont_cxp.monto<minimo_smlv or :cont_cxp.monto>maximo_smlv then
 Messagebox ('El monto del contrato debe estar dentro del rango '||
 'especificado para el tipo de contrato ');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 End If; 
 --
 -- Como los contratos se basan en un CDP, el monto del contrato
 -- o de la modificación debe ser menor o igual que el valor de dicho CDP
 --
 If :cont_cxp.tipo_cdp ='C' Then 
 If Nvl (:DIS_CONT_CXP.Val_Dis, 0) > 0 Then
 If Nvl (:Cont_Cxp.Monto, 0) > Nvl (:DIS_CONT_CXP.Val_Dis, 0) Then
 MessageBox ('Monto del Contrato '||nvl(:cont_cxp.monto,0) || ' Sobrepasa La Disponibilidad '||nvl(:DIS_CONT_CXP.val_dis,0));
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If; 
 End If; 
 Else
 If Nvl (:Cont_Cxp.ValorVig, 0) > 0 Then
 If Nvl (:Cont_Cxp.Monto, 0) > Nvl (:Cont_Cxp.Valorvig, 0) Then
 MessageBox ('Monto del Contrato '||nvl(:cont_cxp.monto,0)|| ' Sobrepasa La Vigencia Futura '||nvl(:cont_cxp.valorvig,0));
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If; 
 End If; 
 End If;
End If; -- Presupuesto oficial

End;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 maximo proy_cxp.maximo_smlv%type;
 minimo proy_cxp.minimo_smlv%type;
Begin 
If VerificaMod('PRESOF') Then
 If :cont_cxp.tipo_cdp='V' Then
 If :Cont_cxp.otrosi='N' Then
 If nvl(:cont_cxp.monto,0) = 0 Then
 :Cont_Cxp.Monto := :Cont_Cxp.Valorvig;
 End If; 
 
 Begin 
 Select maximo_smlv,minimo_smlv
 Into maximo,minimo
 From proy_cxp
 Where c_emp=:global.empresa and c_proy=:cont_cxp.prog_proy and est='A';
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 Messagebox('El tipo de proyecto no esta activo ');
 Raise Form_trigger_failure;
 End; 
 
 End If;
 
 Begin
 Select fec_exp
 Into :cont_cxp.fechacdpvig
 from dispptal_enc
 where c_emp=:global.empresa and dis=:cont_cxp.cdp_vig and periodo=:cont_cxp.percdp_vig;
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 :cont_cxp.fechacdpvig:=null;
 End;
 
 If :cont_cxp.fechacdpvig is not null And (:cont_cxp.f_ini< :cont_cxp.fechacdpvig) Then
 MessageBox ('La Fecha del Contrato'||TO_char(:cont_cxp.f_ini,'DD-MM-YYYY')
 ||' Debe ser mayor a la fecha de la Vigencia Futura '||To_char(:cont_cxp.fechacdpvig,'DD-MM-YYYY'));
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 End If; 
 
 End If;
End If;
END;

Trigger.Name: PRE-DELETE
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin COND_CONT detail program section
 --
 DELETE FROM COND_CONT
 WHERE C_EMP = :CONT_CXP.C_EMP and N_CONT = :CONT_CXP.N_CONT;
 --
 -- End COND_CONT detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin DIS_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 DELETE FROM dis_cont_cxp d
 WHERE d.C_EMP = :CONT_CXP.C_EMP and d.N_CONT = :CONT_CXP.N_CONT;
 --
 -- End DIS_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin COND_CONT detail program section
 --
 DELETE FROM COND_CONT C
 WHERE C.C_EMP = :CONT_CXP.C_EMP and C.N_CONT = :CONT_CXP.N_CONT;
 --
 -- End COND_CONT detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
Begin
 
 :cont_cxp.dias:=:cont_cxp.f_ven - :cont_cxp.f_ini;
 :cont_cxp.MANEJA_ANTICIPOS := NVL( :cont_cxp.MANEJA_ANTICIPOS,'N');
 if :cont_cxp.n_ide is not null then
 :cont_cxp.nomprov := Trae_Nombre (:Global.Empresa, :cont_cxp.n_ide);
 end if;
 
 Select nom 
 into :Cont_cxp.nomage
 From Agencia 
 Where C_Emp = :global.empresa and
 C_age = :cont_cxp.C_agr; 
 
 Select nom into :Cont_cxp.des_tip
 From Tipcont_cxp 
 Where C_Emp = :global.empresa and
 C_tip = :cont_cxp.c_tip;
 
 Begin
 select nom
 into :cont_cxp.NOM_COSTO
 from ccost 
 where c_emp=:global.empresa 
 and c_cos=:cont_cxp.c_cos;
 exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :cont_cxp.NOM_COSTO:=' ';
 End;
 Begin
 select nom
 into :cont_cxp.des_prog
 from proy_cxp
 where c_emp=:global.empresa 
 and c_proy=:cont_cxp.prog_proy;
 exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :cont_cxp.des_prog:=' ';
 End; 
 If (VerificaMod ('PRESOF')) Then 
 If :cont_cxp.tipo_cdp='V' Then
 Begin
 Select fec_exp
 Into :cont_cxp.fechacdpvig
 from dispptal_enc
 where c_emp=:global.empresa and dis=:cont_cxp.cdp_vig and periodo=:cont_cxp.percdp_vig;
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 :cont_cxp.fechacdpvig:=null;
 End;
 End If; 
 End If; 
 If :cont_cxp.f_ini is not null and :cont_cxp.est = 'A' then
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.f_ini',enabled,property_false);
 elsif :cont_cxp.f_ini is not null and :cont_cxp.est = 'G' then
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.f_ini',enabled,property_true);
 End If;
 If :cont_cxp.f_ven is not null and :cont_cxp.est = 'A' then
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.f_ven',enabled,property_false);
 elsif :cont_cxp.f_ven is not null and :cont_cxp.est = 'G' then
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.f_ven',enabled,property_true);
 End If;
 If :cont_cxp.f_firma is not null and :cont_cxp.est = 'A' then
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.f_firma',enabled,property_false);
 elsif :cont_cxp.f_firma is not null and :cont_cxp.est = 'G' then
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.f_firma',enabled,property_true);
 End If;
 
 If :cont_cxp.oc is null Then
 Begin
 Select to_char(fecha,'ddmmyyyy')
 Into :global.fechasel
 From Proc_sel
 Where C_emp = :Global.Empresa
 And N_cont = :Cont_Cxp.N_cont;
 Exception When No_Data_Found Then
 :Global.fechasel := null;
 end;
 Else
 begin
 Select to_char(emi,'ddmmyyyy')
 Into :global.fechasel
 From Oc_enc
 Where c_emp = :global.empresa
 And c_agr = :cont_cxp.c_agr
 And ano = Substr (:DIS_CONT_CXP.periodo, 1, 4)
 And Oc = :cont_cxp.Oc;
 Exception When No_data_found then
 :global.fechasel := null;
 When Too_many_rows then
 :global.fechasel := null;
 end;
 End If;
 :Global.monto := :cont_cxp.monto; 
:cont_cxp.C_TIP_ANT := :cont_cxp.C_TIP; 
 begin
 select NOM 
 into :cont_cxp.DES_TIP
 from tipcont_cxp
 where c_emp=:global.empresa 
 and c_tip=:cont_cxp.c_tip;
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 messagebox(' No se encuentra el tipo de contrato '||:cont_cxp.c_tip);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end;
 Begin
 Select A.tipo, B.nom 
 Into :Cont_Cxp.tipo_cxp, :Cont_Cxp.Nom_cxp
 From Cxp_enc a, tipo_cxp b 
 Where A.c_emp = :Global.Empresa 
 And A.c_agr = :Cont_Cxp.C_agr 
 And A.N_cxp = :Cont_Cxp.N_Cxp
 And A.n_ide = :Cont_Cxp.N_ide 
 And A.tipo = B.C_tip 
 And A.c_emp = B.c_emp;
Exception 
 When No_Data_Found Then 
 messagebox(' No se encuentra la cuenta por pagar'||:cont_cxp.n_cxp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
End;
SYNCHRONIZE; 
End;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin POLIZA_CONTR detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:CONT_CXP.C_EMP is not null) or (:CONT_CXP.N_CONT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('CONT_CXP.CONT_CXP_POLIZA_CONTR'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'POLIZA_CONTR'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End POLIZA_CONTR detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin INT_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:CONT_CXP.C_EMP is not null) or (:CONT_CXP.N_CONT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('CONT_CXP.CONT_CXP_INT_CONT_CXP'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'INT_CONT_CXP'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End INT_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin DIS_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:CONT_CXP.C_EMP is not null) or (:CONT_CXP.N_CONT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('CONT_CXP.CONT_CXP_DIS_CONT_CXP'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'DIS_CONT_CXP'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End DIS_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin COND_CONT detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:CONT_CXP.C_EMP is not null) or (:CONT_CXP.N_CONT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('CONT_CXP.CONT_CXP_COND_CONT'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'COND_CONT'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End COND_CONT detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin POLIZA_CONTR detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR POLIZA_CONTR_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM poliza_contr p 
 WHERE p.C_EMP = :CONT_CXP.C_EMP and p.N_CONT = :CONT_CXP.N_CONT;
 --
 -- End POLIZA_CONTR detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin INT_CONT_CXP detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR INT_CONT_CXP_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM INT_CONT_CXP I 
 WHERE I.c_emp = :CONT_CXP.C_EMP and I.n_cont = :CONT_CXP.N_CONT;
 --
 -- End INT_CONT_CXP detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin POLIZA_CONTR detail program section
 --
 OPEN POLIZA_CONTR_cur; 
 FETCH POLIZA_CONTR_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( POLIZA_CONTR_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE POLIZA_CONTR_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE POLIZA_CONTR_cur;
 --
 -- End POLIZA_CONTR detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin INT_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
 OPEN INT_CONT_CXP_cur; 
 FETCH INT_CONT_CXP_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( INT_CONT_CXP_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('No puede borrar registro maestro cuando existen registros detalle coincidentes.'); 
 CLOSE INT_CONT_CXP_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE INT_CONT_CXP_cur;
 --
 -- End INT_CONT_CXP detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE 
 cerr number:=0;
 merr varchar2(1000);
 Periodo consec_rps.per%type;
 existe tiponum.tipodoc%type;
 
 contra cont_cxp.n_cont%type;
BEGIN
 :CONT_CXP.C_EMP :=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
 :CONT_CXP.EST :='G';
 :cont_cxp.usr := :global.usuario_sp6;
 
 
 --***************************** TIPOS ESPECIALES DE CONTRATO *********************************** 
 
 ---NO SE HA GENERADO EL NUMERO DE CONTRTO LO GENERO 
 ---GENERACION DEL CONSECUTIVO DEL CONTRATO SI ES UNA ORDEN DE SERVICIO 
 ---CALI EMPRESA SOCIAL DE ESTADO ANTONIO NARIÑO 23/07/2007
 Periodo := To_Char(:Cont_Cxp.F_Crea_Cont,'YYYYMM'); 
 :Cont_Cxp.ano := substr(periodo,1,4); 
 Numeracion.Csc (:Global.Empresa, Periodo,'CONTRATO', :Cont_Cxp.CSC , CErr, MErr); 
 If :CONTROL.tipo_num_contrato ='A' then 
 IF :CONT_CXP.N_CONT IS NULL Then 
 :Cont_Cxp.N_cont:= :Cont_Cxp.ano||'-'||:Cont_Cxp.C_Tip||'-'||:Cont_Cxp.CSC ;
 If CErr != 0 Then
 Merr:= 'Error al buscar el Consecutivo '||Cerr||' Mensaje '||SqlErrm;
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End if; 
 END IF; 
 ELSE 
 Begin
 select tipodoc
 into existe
 from tiponum
 where c_emp=:global.empresa 
 and tipodoc=:cont_cxp.prog_proy;
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 insert into tiponum (C_EMP, TIPODOC, TIPONUM,DESCRI)
 values (:global.empresa,:cont_cxp.prog_proy, 'A', :cont_cxp.des_prog);
 End;
 IF :CONT_CXP.N_CONT IS NULL THEN
 Periodo:=to_char(:cont_cxp.f_crea_cont,'YYYYMM');
 Numeracion.Csc (:Global.Empresa, Periodo,:cont_cxp.prog_proy, 
 :Cont_Cxp.cSC, CErr, MErr); 
 If CErr != 0 Then
 MESSAGEBOX( MErr);
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End if; 
 :Cont_Cxp.N_cont:= :Cont_Cxp.ano||'-'||:Cont_Cxp.C_Tip||'-'||:Cont_Cxp.cSC ; 
 END IF;
 IF :CONT_CXP.CSC IS NULL THEN
 Periodo:=to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM');
 Numeracion.Csc (:Global.Empresa, Periodo,'CONTRATO', :Cont_Cxp.cSC, CErr, MErr); 
 If CErr != 0 Then
 MESSAGEBOX( MErr);
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End if; 
 END IF;
 
 END IF; 
END;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 RC_ARE AREA_TRAB.C_ARE%TYPE;
 RC_CAR CARGO_TRAB.C_CAR%TYPE;
BEGIN
 Begin
 Select Nom Into :INT_Cont_Cxp.NomInter
 From Nits 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa and
 N_Ide = :INT_Cont_Cxp.N_IDE;
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 :INT_Cont_Cxp.NomInter:='Interventor No Se Encuentra Registrado';
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;
 
 Begin
 Select c_are, c_car
 Into rc_Are, rc_car
 From contrato 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa 
 and N_Ide = :INT_Cont_Cxp.N_IDE
 and est = 'V';
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 begin
 Select c_are, c_car
 Into rc_Are, rc_car
 From contrato 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa 
 and N_Ide = :INT_Cont_Cxp.N_IDE; 
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 rc_Are := null;
 rc_car := null;
 When too_many_Rows Then
 rc_Are := null;
 rc_car := null;
 end;
 When too_many_Rows Then
 rc_Are := null;
 rc_car := null; 
 End;
 IF RC_ARE IS NOT NULL AND RC_CAR IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT NOM
 INTO :INT_Cont_Cxp.CARGO
 FROM CARGO_tRAB
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa 
 and C_ARE = RC_ARE
 AND C_CAR = RC_CAR; 
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 :INT_Cont_Cxp.CARGO :='Cargo '||rc_are||'-'||rC_CAR||' no registrado';
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: BORRAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE borrar IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := Preguntar('Desea Eliminar Este Registro?');
 If Res = 1 Then
 GO_BLOCK(:TOOLBAR.NOMBRE_BLOQUE); 
 Delete_record;
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: BUSCAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE buscar IS
BEGIN
 GO_BLOCK('CONTROL');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 :control.c_agr := :Cont_Cxp.C_AGR;
 :ContROL.NOMAGE :=:Cont_Cxp.NOMAGE;
 go_item('control.c_agr');
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GRABAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE grabar IS
Res Number;
Cerr Number;
Merr Varchar2(200);
ErrorFound Exception;
resp number;
cuenta number;
fechafin date := null;
fechaini date := null;
numpol poliza_contr.n_poliza%type;
Begin
 if verificamod('PRESOF') THEN 
 IF NVL(INSTR( :CONT_CXP.TIPO_MOD,'V'),0) <> 0 OR :CONT_CXP.TIPO_MOD IS NULL THEN 
 If Nvl (:Cont_Cxp.Monto, 0) <> Nvl (:DIS_CONT_CXP.suma_Dis, 0) Then
 MessageBox ('Monto del Contrato no es igual al total Disponibilidad');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 End If;
 If :cont_cxp.otrosi='S' And :cont_cxp.monto=0 And
 :cont_cxp.tipo_cdp ='C' And :DIS_CONT_CXP.dis is null Then
 Messagebox('El contrato debe tener asignada una Disponibilidad ');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 ElsIf :cont_cxp.tipo_cdp='V' And :cont_cxp.n_vig is null Then
 Messagebox('El contrato debe tener asignada una Vigencia ');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If; 
 If :cont_cxp.tipo_cdp='C' And :DIS_CONT_CXP.fechadis>:cont_cxp.f_ini Then
 Messagebox('La Fecha de la Disponibilidad '||:DIS_CONT_CXP.fechadis||' Debe ser menor a la fecha del contrato'||
 :Cont_cxp.f_ini);
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 ElsIf :cont_cxp.tipo_cdp='V' And :cont_cxp.fechacdpvig >:cont_cxp.f_ini Then
 Messagebox('La Fecha de la Vigencia '||:cont_cxp.fechacdpvig||' Debe ser menor a la fecha del contrato'||
 :Cont_cxp.f_ini);
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If; 
 END IF; 
 END IF;
 If :cont_cxp.Tiene_liq = 'S' and :cont_cxp.Fecha_liq is null Then
 MessageBox('Fecha de liquidación no suministrada. Veriifque ');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If;
 If :cont_cxp.objeto is null then
 messagebox('Verifique que no tiene objeto');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 If :cont_cxp.n_cxp is null then
 messagebox('Contratista no tiene cuenta por pagar asociada');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 If :cont_cxp.TIP_MIN is null then
 messagebox('Contrato no tiene tipo de Minuta. Verifique');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End If; 
 Post;
 If Form_success Then
 
 resp := preguntar('Desea Asentar el contrato? (S/N)');
 If resp = 1 then
 
 Cxpasientacontrato(:GLobal.Empresa, :Cont_cxp.N_cont,Cerr,Merr); 
 If CErr <> 0 Then
 MsgErr (CErr, MErr);
 Raise ErrorFound; 
 else
 Messagebox('Se ha asentado el CONTRATO '||:cont_cxp.n_cont); 
 End If; 
 else
 Messagebox('Se ha actualizado el CONTRATO '||:cont_cxp.n_cont);
 end if; 
 Commit_Form; 
 IMPRIMIR; 
 Limpiar;
 End If;
 
Exception
 When ErrorFound Then
 Rollback;
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INICIO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE INICIO IS
Begin 
 :Global.Fechasel := null;
 :Global.monto := null;
 Execute_Trigger ('INIT');
-- Enable ('cont_cxp.n_cont_ref',1);
-- Enable ('cont_cxp.cod_ret',1);
 Enable('Toolbar.Boton_Imprimir',1);
 
 If Not verificamod('PRESOF') Then
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.presu',visible,property_False); 
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.n_vig',displayed,property_False);
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.per_vig',displayed,property_False);
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.valorvig',displayed,property_False);
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.cdp_vig',displayed,property_False);
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.percdp_vig',displayed,property_False);
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.fechacdpvig',displayed,property_False);
 End If; 
 select to_char(sysdate,'YYYY') into :control.ano
 from dual;
 Set_item_property('cont_cxp.N_CONT',enabled,property_False);
 
 Begin 
 Select C_AGE, NOM
 Into :Cont_Cxp.C_AGR, :Cont_Cxp.NOMAGE
 From AGENCIA 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa ;
 Exception 
 When No_Data_Found Then 
 MESSAGEBOX('No se ha definido parametros de Proveedores');
 exit_form(no_validate); 
 When TOO_MANY_ROWS Then 
 NULL; 
 End; 
 Begin 
 Select Mon,Cam
 Into :Cont_Cxp.Mon, :Cont_Cxp.Tas
 From MOneda 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa 
 And M_Default = 'S';
 Exception 
 When No_Data_Found Then 
 Messagebox('No se ha creado la moneda del Pais');
 End; 
 Begin 
 Select NVL(tipo_num_contrato,'A') 
 Into :CONTROL.tipo_num_contrato
 From PARAM_CXP 
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa ;
 Exception 
 When No_Data_Found Then 
 MESSAGEBOX('No se ha definido parametros de Proveedores');
 exit_form(no_validate); 
 End;
 
 
 Begin 
 Select TIPO 
 Into :CONT_CXP.TIPO
 From USU_PROC_CTR
 Where C_Emp = :Global.Empresa 
 AND USU_SP6=:Global.usuario_sp6;
 Exception 
 When No_Data_Found Then 
 MESSAGEBOX('No se ha Asignado un Proceso al Usuario');
 exit_form(no_validate); 
 End;
 
 
 
 if :CONTROL.tipo_num_contrato = 'A' THEN 
 Set_Item_Property ('Cont_cxp.n_cont', enabled, Property_false);
 Else
 Set_Item_Property ('Cont_cxp.n_cont', enabled, Property_True);
 End If; 
 
End;

ProgramUnit.Name: LIMPIAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE limpiar IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := 1;
-- messagebox(:system.form_status||' '||:system.block_status);
 If (:System.form_status = 'CHANGED' Or :System.form_status = 'NEW') Then
 Res := Preguntar ('La Forma Tiene Datos Sin Grabar. Desea Blanquear?');
 End If;
 If (Res = 1) Then
 Clear_Form (No_Validate);
 --Set_item_property('cont_cxp.N_CONT',visible,property_False);
 --Set_item_property('cont_cxp.TIPO_CONT_MON',visible,property_True);
 --Set_item_property('cont_cxp.TIPO_CONT_MON',enabled,property_True);
 Inicio;
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SALIR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE salir IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := 0;
 If (:System.form_status = 'CHANGED') Then
 Res := Preguntar ('La Forma Tiene Datos Sin Grabar. Desea Almacenarlos Ahora?');
 End If;
 If (Res = 1) Then
 Grabar;
 End If;
 Exit_form(no_validate);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE validar IS
BEGIN
 If (VerificaMod ('PRESOF')) Then 
 --
 -- Como los contratos se basan en un CDP, el monto del contrato
 -- o de la modificación debe ser menor o igual que el valor de dicho CDP
 --
 /* If Nvl (:Cont_Cxp.Monto, 0) < Nvl (:DIS_CONT_CXP.suma_Dis, 0) Then
 MessageBox ('Monto del Contrato Sobrepasa La Disponibilidad');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 --:Cont_Cxp.Monto := :DIS_CONT_CXP.Val_Dis;
 End If; */
 If Nvl (:Cont_Cxp.Monto, 0) is null or Nvl (:Cont_Cxp.Monto, 0)=0 Then
 :Cont_Cxp.Monto := :DIS_CONT_CXP.Val_Dis;
 End If; 
 
 If :cont_cxp.f_firma< :DIS_CONT_CXP.fechadis Then
 MessageBox ('La Fecha del Contrato'||to_char(:cont_cxp.f_firma,'DD-MM-YYYY')
 ||' Debe ser mayor a la fecha del CDP '||To_char(:DIS_CONT_CXP.fechadis,'DD-MM-YYYY'));
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 End If; 
End If; -- Presupuesto oficial

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDA_NCXP
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE valida_ncxp IS
BEGIN
 If :cont_cxp.n_cxp is null then
 messagebox('El contratista debe tener cuenta por pagar asociada. Verifique');
 raise Form_trigger_Failure;
 else
 next_item;
 end if;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: ACTUALIZA_FECHAS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE actualiza_fechas IS
 monto number := 0;
 porc number := 0;
 wano number := 0;
 wmes number := 0;
 wdia Number := 0;
 wfecha varchar2(8);

BEGIN
 :poliza_contr.f_ini := :cont_cxp.f_ini;
 :poliza_contr.f_fin := :cont_cxp.F_ven;
 Begin
 Select porcen,ano,mes,dias
 Into porc, wano, wmes, wdia
 From tipo_poliza
 Where c_emp = :global.empresa
 and cod_tipo = :poliza_contr.cod_tipo;
 Exception When No_Data_Found Then
 messagebox('Porcentaje de aplicación No definido para el tipo de Póliza');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;
-- Aplica el porcentaje sobre el monto de acuerdo a la póliza seleccionada.
 If porc > 0 then
 :poliza_contr.monto := :cont_cxp.monto * porc / 100;
 End If;
-- Actualiza la fecha final de acuerdo al número de años, meses, días definidas 
 If :cont_cxp.f_ven is not null then
 If wdia > 0 then
 :poliza_contr.f_fin := :cont_cxp.f_ven + wdia;
 End If;
 If wmes > 0 then
 :poliza_contr.f_fin := add_months(:poliza_contr.f_fin,wmes);
 End If;
 If wano > 0 then
 Begin
 select to_char(to_number(to_char(:poliza_contr.f_fin,'YYYY')) + wano)||
 to_char(:poliza_contr.F_fin,'mmdd') 
 Into wfecha
 from dual; 
 Exception When Others then messagebox(sqlerrm);
 End;
 :poliza_contr.F_fin := to_date(wfecha,'YYYYMMDD'); 
 End If;
 End If;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VERIFICAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE verificar IS
 HAY_MOV numbeR; 
 N_CONT_NEW CONT_CXP.N_CONT%TYPE;
BEGIN
 --- SE VERIFICA QUE EL CONTRATO NO TENGA MOVIMIENTO
IF :CONT_CXP.C_TIP <> :CONT_CXP.C_TIP_ANT THEN
 
 --- BUSCO POR TODAS LAS TABLAS PARA VER SI EXISTEN CON EL VIEJO
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM COND_CONT
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (COND_CONT)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM CONT_CXP_REQ
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (CONT_CXP_REQ)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM CONT_CXP_SUSP
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (CONT_CXP_SUSP)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM CONTRATO_HISTO
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (CONTRATO_HISTO)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM CONTRATO_HISTO
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONTM = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (CONTRATO_HISTO)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM CTA_COBRO
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (CTA_COBRO)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM CXP_DET
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique.(CXP_DET)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM CXP_FACT_ENC
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (CXP_FACT_ENC)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM DESC_CONT
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique (DESC_CONT)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM MULT_CONT
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (MULT_CONT)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM NOTAS_CXP
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (NOTAS_CXP)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM NOVEDAD_CONT
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique.(NOVEDAD_CONT)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF;
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM POLIZA_CONTR
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (POLIZA_CONTR)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM PRESTAMO_CXP
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (PRESTAMO_CXP)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM PROC_SEL
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (PROC_SEL)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM DIS_CONT_CXP
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (DIS_CONT_CXP)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM INT_CONT_CXP
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = :Cont_Cxp.N_CONT; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||:Cont_Cxp.N_CONT||' tiene movimiento Verifique. (INT_CONT_CXP)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 N_CONT_NEW := :Cont_Cxp.ano||'-'||:Cont_Cxp.C_Tip||'-'||:Cont_Cxp.CSC ;
 
 
 SELECT COUNT(*) 
 INTO HAY_MOV 
 FROM CONT_CXP 
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND N_CONT = N_CONT_NEW; 
 IF NVL(HAY_MOV,0) <> 0 THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX('El contrato '||N_CONT_NEW||' Ya existe Verifique. (CONT_CXP)');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 :CONT_CXP.N_CONT := N_CONT_NEW; 
 
 END IF; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CALCULA_FECHA
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE calcula_fecha IS
 wfecha varchar2(8);
 nfecha date;
 vence date; 
Begin
 If :CONT_CXP.f_ini is not null then
 vence := :CONT_CXP.f_ini ; 
 If NVL(:CONT_CXP.dias_plazo,0) > 0 then
 nfecha := vence + NVL(:CONT_CXP.dias_plazo,0); 
 Begin
 Select to_char(nfecha,'YYYYMMDD')
 Into wfecha
 From Dual;
 Exception When Others 
 then messagebox('1 '||sqlerrm);
 End;
 vence := to_date(wfecha,'YYYYMMDD')-1; 
 End If;
 If NVL(:CONT_CXP.mes_plazo,0) > 0 then
 Begin
 Select to_char(add_months(vence, NVL(:CONT_CXP.mes_plazo,0)),'YYYYMMDD')
 Into wfecha
 From Dual;
 Exception When Others 
 then messagebox('2 '||sqlerrm);
 End;
 vence := to_date(wfecha,'YYYYMMDD')-1; 
 End If;
 If NVL(:CONT_CXP.ano_plazo,0) > 0 then
 
 Begin
 select to_char(to_number(to_char(vence,'YYYY')) + NVL(:CONT_CXP.ano_plazo,0))||
 to_char(vence,'mmdd') 
 Into wfecha
 from dual; 
 Exception 
 When Others then
 messagebox('4 '||sqlerrm);
 End;
 
 vence := to_date(wfecha,'YYYYMMDD')-1; 
 End If;
 End If; 
 :CONT_CXP.f_ven := vence ; 
 :CONT_CXP.Dias:=:CONT_CXP.f_ven - :CONT_CXP.f_ini+1;
 If :CONT_CXP.tiene_liq = 'S' and :CONT_CXP.f_ven is not null Then
 :CONT_CXP.fecha_liq := add_months(:CONT_CXP.f_ven,2);
 End if;
 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: IMPRIMIR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE IMPRIMIR IS
list_id ParamList; 
rcont Number;
Resc Number; 

BEGIN
 -- ojo si no le coloque interventor porque lo pregunta
 begin
 select count(*) 
 into rcont 
 from int_cont_cxp
 where c_emp=:global.empresa
 and n_cont = :CONT_CXP.N_CONT;
 
 end;
 if nvl(rcont,0) <> 0 then 
 Resc := Preguntar ('Desea imprimir la Designacion de Interventor-Supervisor?');
 --
 -- Mando A imprimir la Disponibilidad
 --
 If Resc = 1 Then
 list_id := Create_Parameter_List('param');
 Add_Parameter(list_id,'EMP',TEXT_PARAMETER,:global.empresa);
 Add_Parameter(list_id,'n_contr',TEXT_PARAMETER,:CONT_CXP.N_CONT);
 Add_Parameter(list_id,'fecini',TEXT_PARAMETER,to_char(:CONT_CXP.F_CREA_CONT,'DD-MM-YYYY'));
 Add_Parameter(list_id,'fecfin',TEXT_PARAMETER,to_char(:CONT_CXP.F_CREA_CONT,'DD-MM-YYYY'));
 Run_Product(REPORTS,'CONTR40.REP',ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,list_id);
 If Not Id_Null(list_id) THEN
 Destroy_Parameter_List(list_id);
 End If;
 End If;
 end if; 
END;

Select c_are,nom

select n.n_ide, n.nom 
from nits n 
where n.c_emp = :global.empresa 
order by 2

Select c_cos,nom
from ccost
where c_emp=:global.empresa
and cla_cc ='D'
and activo ='S'
order by 1

SUBSTR(TRAE_NOMBRE(C_EMP,N_IDE),1,60) NOMBRE, MONTO 
from cont_cxp 
where c_emp = :global.empresa 
and est='G'

from dispptal_enc
WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA and 
 estado in ('A','L') and periodo = :DIS_CONT_CXP.periodo

from dispptal_det a,ccost b where 
a.c_emp =:global.empresa and
a.dis =:DIS_CONT_CXP.dis and
a.periodo =:DIS_CONT_CXP.periodo and
a.c_emp=b.c_emp and
a.C_COS=b.C_COS

RecordGroup.Name: DISPPTAL_ENC

select obs, periodo, dis, nvl(tot_dis,0) tot_dis,fec_exp
from dispptal_enc
WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA and 
 estado in ('A','L') and periodo = :CONTROL.BPER

FROM DISPPTAL_ENC 
WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
AND ESTADO='A'

select distinct n_ide, nom from nits 
where c_emp = :global.empresa 
AND N_IDE like nvl(:int_cont_cxp.N_IDE,'%') 
and est = 'A' 
order by nom

select oc , ano,proved 
from oc_enc 
where c_emp= :global.empresa and c_agr= :cont_cxp.c_agr and proved=:cont_cxp.n_ide

from cont_cxp where c_emp=:global.empresa and otrosi='N' and n_ide=:cont_cxp.n_ide order by n_cont

RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select c_age código, nom nombre from agencia where c_emp = :global.empresa

select distinct a.n_ide, b.nom 
from cont_cxp a, nits b 
where a.c_emp = b.c_emp and 
a.n_ide = b.n_ide and 
a.c_emp = :global.empresa and

substr(trae_nombre(e.c_emp,e.n_ide) , 1,60) nom

where e.c_emp = :global.empresa
and e.c_agr = :cont_cxp.c_agr

RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select a.n_cxp,a.tipo, b.nom from cxp_enc a, tipo_cxp b where a.c_emp = :global.empresa and a.c_agr = :cont_cxp.c_agr and a.n_ide = :cont_cxp.n_ide and a.tipo = b.c_tip and a.c_emp = b.c_emp

select n_vig,per_vig,x.dis,fec_exp,x.periodo,(nvl(tot_dis,0)-nvl(tot_real,0)) saldo
from dispptal_enc x,dispptal_det y
where x.c_emp=y.c_emp and n_vig is not null and
x.periodo=y.periodo and x.dis=y.dis and
x.c_emp=:global.empresa and 
PresofsaldoDocCdp (:global.empresa,y.dis,y.periodo) > 0

and z.cod_greq=a.cod_greq

From Tipo_Contrato A, Tipcont_Cxp B

RecordGroup.Name: TIPO_PROC

Trigger.Name: INIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 Empresa Parametros.Emp%Type;
 LogoPath Varchar2 (200); 
Begin
 --
 -- Maximiza la ventana inicial
 --
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL:=20;
 Set_Window_Property ('WINDOW0', Window_State, Maximize);
 --
 -- Selecciona el nombre de la empresa
 -- 
 :GLOBAL.empresa:= '01';
 :Global.usuario_sp6 :='ADMIN'; 
 :TOOLBAR.c_emp := :GLOBAL.empresa;
 Begin
 Select Emp, logo Into Empresa, :toolbar.nombre_logo
 From Parametros
 Where C_Emp = :TOOLBAR.c_emp;
 Exception
 When no_data_found Then
 --
 -- Si la empresa no está definida se sale de la forma
 --
 MessageBox ('Empresa '||:TOOLBAR.c_emp||' no está definida.');
 Exit_Form (No_Validate); 
 End;
 --
 -- Despliega el nombre de la empresa en una o dos líneas
 -- dependiendo de la longitud del nombre
 --
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1 := Empresa;
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2 := Empresa;
 If (NVL(Length (:Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1), 0) > 30) Then
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, Property_True);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, Property_False);
 Else
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, property_False);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, property_True);
 End If;
 --
 -- Despliega el logo de la empresa
 --
 execute_trigger('lee_imagenes');

 --
 -- Llama al procedimiento de inicio particular de cada forma
 --
 Default_Value ('***', 'global.audsid'); 
 Begin
 Select machine Into Empresa
 From v$usr_sess
 Where audsid = :Global.audsid;
 Exception
 When others Then
 --- Exit_Form (No_Validate); 
 Null;
 End;
End;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS

--

--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
